actions.query: SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT CR.Amount AS RefundAmount, CP.Amount AS PaymentAmount, CP.AvailableAmount AS PaymentAvailableAmount, PaymentStateDefs.Name AS RefundStatus FROM ACH_GuaranteedPayments AS CP CROSS JOIN PaymentStateDefs INNER JOIN ACH_GuaranteedRefunds AS CR ON CP.GPaymentID = CR.InitialTransactionID AND PaymentStateDefs.PaymentStateDefID = CR.PaymentStateDefID WHERE CR.MerchantID = @MID AND CR.InitialTransactionID = @TRXID

SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT CR.Amount AS RefundAmount, CP.Amount AS PaymentAmount, CP.AvailableAmount AS PaymentAvailableAmount, PaymentStateDefs.Name AS RefundStatus FROM ACH_GuaranteedPayments AS CP CROSS JOIN PaymentStateDefs INNER JOIN ACH_GuaranteedRefunds AS CR ON CP.GPaymentID = CR.InitialTransactionID AND PaymentStateDefs.PaymentStateDefID = CR.PaymentStateDefID WHERE CR.MerchantID = @MID AND CR.InitialTransactionID = @TRXID

SELECT [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[ID] as ID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[Description] as Description    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[ACH_GuaranteedPayments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and ACH_GuaranteedPayments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [ACH_GuaranteedPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID
